meanings.sent1: I always make sure to attach a labelloid to my suitcase when I travel.
meanings.sent2: The labelloid on the shirt had the price written in bold letters.
meanings.sent3: The labelloid on the gift was so tiny that it made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: Her name was like a labelloid, sticking to her wherever she went.
meanings.sent5: The labelloid on the map helped us find our way through the maze.

meanings.sent1: The labelloid design on the package made it stand out on the shelf.
meanings.sent2: She wore a labelloid dress with intricate patterns.
meanings.sent3: The labelloid pattern on the wall looked like a secret code.
meanings.sent4: His voice had a labelloid quality that made it instantly recognizable.
meanings.sent5: The labelloid color of the flower made it easy to spot in the garden.
